sentence.Network_en: Dr. Ferrara is an excellent obstetrician - gynecologist. I highly recommend her.
sentence.Network_cn: 费拉拉医师是个很优秀的妇产科医师. 我强力推荐她.

sentence.Network_en: On Tuesday night the friendly against Holland in Ferrara.
sentence.Network_cn: 本周二他将参加对荷兰的友谊赛.

sentence.Network_en: Girolamo Savonarola was born in Ferrara in 1452, the son of a jobless and extravagant father.
sentence.Network_cn: 吉罗拉默·萨佛纳罗拉1452年生于费拉拉城, 父亲无业而又放纵游荡.
